_header: Dread God with all thy might
_description: Good advice — two couplets and a short-line monorhymed quatrain

CULDd454.Transcription:
Drede god with all thy myght loue hym bothe day and nyghtffor
                    þat I ye haue hyghtHeuyn blis to þe is ryghtffor sothe I
                    wysswho so do þissOf heuyn blishe lay not myss
